root.text: Welcome to the personal site of Matthew Broatch! I'm currently showcasing this DialogueTree component!

tellMeMore.text: What else do you wanna know?

then.text:
You can run custom scripts, hide choices until conditions are met, and even use totally custom node components!

Working examples can be found in the **sidebar.** Navigate to the example you want under `DialogueTree`.

choices.text: What do you want out of a Dialogue Tree for React?

then.text:
I want it to:

- Use an input format simple enough for a non-programmer to read and even author dialogues.

- Support a delightful amount of customization.

- Allow a parent component to build a seamlessly integrated experience around it.
As for why I built it in the first place, it just seemed like it would be fun to build! Doing it right meant I had to design a versatile yet simple API.
